summary: This is an email chain from August 14, 2019, discussing scheduling a proffer session with a witness. The participants include an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and other individuals whose names are redacted, coordinating a meeting for the following day.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the initial email proposing a meeting time for a proffer session with a witness.

events.title: Scheduled Proffer Session
events.description: A proffer meeting with a witness was proposed for Thursday, August 15, 2019, at 2:30 PM.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The email discusses scheduling a proffer session with a witness in August 2019, indicating ongoing investigative activity after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.
The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York, the office prosecuting the Epstein case.
Multiple individuals are referenced in the email chain, but their names are redacted in the provided text.
An attachment named 'Epstein_Investigative_Reports.pdf' is mentioned, suggesting the sharing of investigative materials.
